text.div:
Lyme Disease (Tests for Borrelia afzelii/garinii/mayonii Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    82471-4 Borrelia garinii+afzelii (oppA1) gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    82472-2 Borrelia garinii+afzelii (oppA1) gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with non-probe detection
    82473-0 Borrelia mayonii (oppA1) gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    82474-8 Borrelia mayonii (oppA1) gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with non-probe detection
